title: Top-5-hotels-to-visit-in-Varanasi

article.heading: Brijama Palace
paragraph: Built on its own ghat brijrama palace is a heritage hotel and is one of the oldest structures in varanasi: about 200 years old. The quaint charm is remarkably restored at BrijRama place.Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is equipped with a flat-screen TV. Every room comes with a private bathroom fitted with a shower. For your comfort, you will find slippers, free toiletries and a hair dryer. Hi-tea, yoga sessions and bottled water are complimentary.Live classical music can be enjoyed at the Bada Aangan. Ahilhya features traditional, rich Banarasi Silk, Ayurvedic cosmetics and religious mementos for gifting. Beautiful views can be enjoyed from The Kamalya Terrace. Your stay at this hotel wit add to the mystic of your trip in varanasi

article.heading: Raddison Hotel
paragraph: Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, Radisson hotel has been welcoming guests since 2013, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travellers like you. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a minibar, seating area and flat-screen satellite TV. The attached bathroom comes with a hairdryer, shower and free toiletries. Guests can enjoy onsite restaurant and lounge during their stay. Apart from great service radisson is located near major tourist sites such as sarnath, kashi vishwanath etc

article.heading: Taj Ganges
paragraph: Built on the bank of varuna river taj ganges is a centrally located elite hotel. Set in 23 acres of gardens, this 5-star resort provides a place to relax in style within the busy city of Varanasi. The Taj Ganges, Varanasi offers 130 large rooms with beautiful decor, satellite TV, broadband internet access, and tranquil views across mango groves and rose gardens. If you are looking to get some time away from the chaos of ghat then this hotel is perfect for you.

article.heading: Taj Nadesar Palace
paragraph: Just 6 km away from the scenic views of ganga this historical palace sits amidst mango orchids and jasmine fields. This hotel is best known for its architectural style and customer service. This place has been a home away from  home for royalties and celebrities. The rooms are equipped with four-poster beds and traditional furnishings, along  with a flat-screen TV, DVD player and minibar. Also Large marble bathrooms have a bathtub in it. This location is particularly enjoyed by couples

article.heading: Clarks Hotel
paragraph: This enchanting place lies 6 km away from kashi vishwanath temple and manikarnika ghat. It has elegant rooms with wooden flooring equipped with a personal safe,tea or coffee maker and bathroom with a shower. This hotel is a flagship of clarks group of hotels. This place has a great ambience and it provides one of the best customer service in varanasi
